meaningMnemonic: The <kanji>candidate</kanji> is <kanji>someone</kanji> who's a <kanji>supplement</kanji> to the entire political system. Despite being a supplement, they're still a <vocabulary>candidate</vocabulary> nonetheless, unless they can win!
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well.
